We are P-curiosity Lab

An innovation lab to design a new farmers services bio-inspired

Start A Projects

Mission

We observe, we Design, we Prototype we Test then we Serve.

We think about innovation in both ways, to deliver innovative & radically inclusive services, and as a solution for market Challenges ”
Learn More →

PCL OBJECTIVES

Groom and Incubate innovative ideas in early stages (from the ideation phase)
Focus on Corporate Innovation challenges
Valorize data-driven insights in order to boost go-to market services

HOW DOES IT WORK?

WHAT WE OFFER ?

To Rural Communities

To Idea-Holders

To Business

To Researchers & Scientifics

To Rural Communities

Bringing knowledge to market :
Where innovation starts. That is our slogan and it complements our knowledge development and education. We translate our academic and technological findings into solutions that help tackle smallholder farmers challenges. Successful knowledge valorization gives us a position at the heart of the africain knowledge economy.
Business expertise center :
We do that within our expertise center by translating knowledge to business. For this purpose we have an enthusiastic and experienced team of experts and business advisors available to help PCL.

Read More →

To idea-holders

To make your idea Succeed :
The LAB is aimed at who want to start their start-up, test their ideas, develop prototypes in practice in order to prepare a market-ready product or service.
To be able to address a relevant business challenges :
Startups can help business services to find a new opportunities and scale partnership.
To take advantage of a unique collaboration opportunities :
The LAB members will be able to collaborate with different teams : commercial, scientific, etc. and to have acces to UM6P’s living LABs (Experimental farm, Fab LAB, Energy Green Park, etc.)

Read More →

To business

The P-Curiosity LAB aims to develop new ideas to address the companies's challenges. We see ourselves as trend scout, networker, unconventional think tank, knowledge carrier, partner, and facilitator unified in our goal to play an active part in shaping the future of smallholder farmer through innovation. service.
As part of consortium, you will be able to :
- Take advantage on collaboration with the researches institutes, corporations, ONG’s, the scientifics, etc. This collaboration will hustles with innovative people & their world-shaping ideas opportunities and scale partnership.
- Transform by identifying and creating new services and finding a new business opportunities

Read More →

To researchers & scientifics

Bringing knowledge to market:
Where innovation starts. That is our slogan and it complements our knowledge development and education. We translate our academic and technological findings into solutions that help tackle smallholer farmers challenges. Successful knowledge valorization gives us a position at the heart of the africain knowledge economy.
Business expertise center:
We do that within our expertise center by translating knowledge to business. For this purpose we have an enthusiastic and experienced team of experts and business advisors available to help PCL members as well as external parties.
